home.title: Software Developer, DIY-dude and bike enthusiast
home.description: Hey! I'm Leevi, a passionate software developer with a love for creating and making things. When I'm not coding, you can find me tinkering with and riding bikes. Welcome to my personal site!

work.title: Work Experience
work.1: Developed and maintained new features for invoicing web application and internal collection system using PHP, MySQL, JavaScript, HTML, and CSS.
work.2: Implemented and maintained integrations with third party platforms such as point of sale systems and accounting software.
work.3: Optimized application performance by identifying bottlenecks and implementing efficient solutions.
work.4: Monitored system performance and resolved technical issues in Linux/Nginx server environment.
